answers.answer: Hi,If you are type 1 diabetes, this means  your pancreas doesn't work.  In this case there is no alternative to taking insulin.If you are type 2, you may be able to control blood sugars by adopting a very low carb diet.  However, for some people, even despite best efforts, medication will be required.

question: I don't want to take diabetic medicine everyday is there are substitute ?
title: I don't want to take diabetic medicine everyday is there are substitute ?
